snippet: With the 20th anniversary of Rwanda's genocide and the centennial of the start of World War I, the time is ripe to explore the impact of colonialism.
lead_paragraph: With the 20th anniversary of Rwanda's genocide and the centennial of the start of World War I, the time is ripe to explore the impact of colonialism.

headline.main: Colonialism, Bloodshed and Blame for Rwanda

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
